name: Logi-Serve
overview: Logi-Serve, LLC, is an outgrowth of a decade of experience working with some of America’s largest public and private companies. Our goal is to establish a fresh global vision: to redefine the human capital technology marketplace through patent-pending technologies that are smarter, faster, and more accurate than even the most up-to-date systems. Our Mission Logi-Serve’s mission is to deliver success for our clients by developing and supporting the smartest, fastest, and most results-driven products in our industry.Using our proprietary Visual Logic™storyboarding,Triangulation™ science platform, and cloud-based dashboard analytics system, we provide top-tier solutions that revolutionize the entire lifecycle of workforce management. This includes selection, supervision, leadership, development, and culture. We help you empower employees to perform better and embrace your brand promise.Logi-Serve is a new step forward, superior to any other offerings in the marketplace. We are focused on enhancing the user experience and boosting the accuracy of assessment science. That’s why we call Logi-Serve the “ultimate predictor.” It is your strategic weapon to identify the right people who are able to make the right decisions to get the results you want.
